pages.text: $(li)The Ogre Tusk is an item that can be used to brew a $(l:patchouli:potions/goblins_and_dungeons/ogres_might)Potion of Ogre's Might$(/l) in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/brewing_stand)Brewing Stand$(/l).$(br)$(li)The $(l:patchouli:bosses/ogre)Ogre$(/l) may drop this item upon death.
